briefTitle: Minimally Invasive Thoracic Surgery Intercostal Nerve Block Trial

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Robotic or Video-Assisted Lung Resection for All Indications

Exclusion Criteria:

* Additional Thoracic Procedures (beyond lung resection and mediastinal lymphadenectomy)
* Extra-Thoracic Procedures
* Hypersensitivity to Amide Local Analgesia
* Cardiac Conduction Abnormalities
* Hepatic Dysfunction
* Preoperative Neuropathic Pain and/or Preoperative Daily Opioid Usage

outcomeMeasures.title: Average Daily In-Hospital Use of Opioids
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured in Oral Morphine Equivalents per Day

outcomeMeasures.title: Average Daily In-Hospital Pain Score
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured 0-10 Visual Analog Scale for Pain (Higher Score Means Worse Pain).

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Postoperative Pneumonia
